New Records: Tyrese Haliburton scored 33 points and handed out 15 assists
Key Match Events: Pacers got six points in 30 seconds — a three-point play from Turner and a 3-pointer from Siakam — to go up 78-58 with 8:08 left in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Haliburton had 16 points and five assists in the first quarter, the third time in his career that he has done that in a quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers made 17 3-pointers and are now 8-2 this season when connecting at least 15 times from beyond the arc
Thursday was the 25th anniversary of Miami's first game at what is now called Kaseya Center
Others: Jimmy Butler scored nine points, and didn’t play in the fourth quarter for a second consecutive night
